findings.title: Inefficency in migration calculations
findings.description: There is a small inefficiency on how migrations are calculated, and this could lead to a DoS issue.

findings.title: Incorrect business logic in decimals function
findings.description: The return value of decimals is 0, and developers need to confirm the business logic here.

findings.title: Coding standards issues
findings.description: There are better practices for coding or architecture.

findings.title: Specification violation (Checks-Effects-Interactions)
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Checks-Effects-Interactions pattern, which can lead to reentrancy attacks or other security vulnerabilities.
